reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater set comfortable and soft, with a slim skirt that hits at mid-calf. They appreciate its versatility, noting it can be dressed up with jewelry and pairs well with different tops, and one customer mentions it works well with both sneakers and tall boots. Customers describe the outfit as beautiful, with one noting it looks more expensive than it is, and they like its warmth, with one mentioning

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two piece set
items.body: Beautiful two piece set. Very thick and nice Read more
items.author: Karina Angel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it, surprisingly flattering!
items.body: Love this, just ordered in another color! Surprisingly flattering even with a bit of a belly, the skirt is very slimming. Soft, warm and comfortable, looking forward to wearing it when the weather gets cooler. Read more
items.author: KLN

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprised for many reasons
items.body: Was not sure what to expect in terms of quality but I was quite surprised when I opened the package and felt the set-pretty good quality with a great price. I sized up to a medium so the skirt would not be form fitted. THE ONLY PROBLEM- I’ve only worn it twice so far (not washed) and I can tell the fabric is starting to pill :( bummer. I’m sure there’s a tool out there to get rid of pilling. Other than that, I love how the skirt has a lined waist band that both secures it on your waist while also allowing for stretch. The top has sleeves that kind of cuff at the wrist which is a cute detail. I actually ended up returning the cream color but kept the black one just because the white one outlined by bottom too much. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I absolutely love this outfit!
items.body: I live in a mountain state where the winters are long and cold. This outfit is perfect for church! It is so cute, warm, simple, and easy to style. Any color boots look great. You can wear some fleece lined tights, layer some jewelry and you are good to go! This is my go-to church outfit and I shared this link with all my friends as a must have for winter. Read more
items.author: Emily

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but poor quality
items.body: It’s cozy and looks great on. But it pilled very quickly. Read more
items.author: MARTIN NAT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Love Love it!
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised!! Often times you’re taking a chance by purchasing clothes online, sometimes especially when you’re a curvy girl. The clothes are either not true to size, or they are flimsy, or they just don’t compliment your shape. I was literally blown away by this purchase right out of the bag!! This is NOT a flimsy item. There is substantial weight to this item without “ bulkiness “which you will appreciate when it’s cold outside! The feel of this item you will appreciate as well. It’s “cozy soft” and the color was a warm vanilla ( that’s what I call it), and it’s true to size! I’m 5”7 and wear an XL and it fits perfectly! I imagine it might “ pull up” a bit, but no worries, just gentle shave them away. I would also recommend using a laundry bag and gentle cycle when washing. It will extend the life as well. I am very happy with this purchase and will definitely buy more from this seller!! Read more
items.author: Cynthia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tall-friendly!
items.body: I’m a tall lady (5’ 11” and 165 lb), and I’m thrilled to report that this fits like a dream. I usually wear a large, but I saw a couple reviews saying the waist of the skirt was a little snug, so I sized up to an XL. No regrets! The sleeves are plenty long enough and the skirt hits at mid-calf. Super thick knit and feels very cozy. Read more
items.author: SM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, so soft and the perfect fit.
items.body: This two piece sweater is so soft and looks so good. I’m 5ft tall 115 pounds I ordered a small and them ordered a second color in XS. The small was still a good fit but if you want a bit of a snug fit, but not tight, size down. If you have curves go for your regular size. You will love this set! Read more
items.author: Kat

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Beige, Black, Camel, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
